Hi Luke,

Can you give us a progress update on the plant hmi? Do we need a review with Steve?

Colleen

Yes the afternoon will work best for us.

 

Colleen

Sr. Manager- Sales & Engineering

Accelerated Mobile Power (AMP)

Luke
